DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , open-label , single-arm study evaluate safety efficacy obinutuzumab alone combination chemotherapy participant previously untreated relapsed/refractory chronic lymphocytic leukemia ( CLL ) . Participants receive 6 cycle single-agent obinutuzumab obinutuzumab combination chemotherapy investigator 's discretion . Each participant follow 30 month last participant enrol . Total length study anticipate approximately 5 year .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety And Efficacy Study Obinutuzumab Alone Combination With Chemotherapy Participant With Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia
